wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Stanley Williams (1861 in Brighton – 21 November 1938) was an English solicitor and amateur astronomer. He dedicated himself to the telescopic observation of the planets. He also was enthusiastic about yachting, winning the Challenge Cup in 1920.

response: *On August 31, 1877, English amateur astronomer Arthur Stanley Williams noticed some sort of phosphorescent glow on the shadowed southern part of the walled plain Plato.A.J.M.Wanders, Op Ontdekking in het Maanland, blz 356
*Arthur Stanley Williams (1861–1938), British solicitor and amateur astronomer
